_xResult.title: Walking Dogs Kaftan by EUG fashion - KA0195CT
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made button-up maxi with long-sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
We love this custom made kaftan/caftan for its custom made fit, button-up front, belt to help add shape and ruffles on the bottom to add dimension. This loose maxi is made of cotton, so you won’t get overheated in the long garment. You can belt and button it for its own outfit, or leave it open and layer on cooler days.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
